name: Sugar Overkill: Arena
description:
[Posted: 19th of september 2018]

///////// INTRODUCTION /////////
Sugar Overkill: Arena is a game made by BlueBirb Studio
Hugo Tigrato (AKA Frone): Programming;
Vladislav Bondar: Audio, Visuals, Animation;

SO:A is a shooter where you fight endless waves of sugar-mutants in order to upgrade your gun in a random and crazy fashion. Your gun is a blank canvas and everything about it can be changed. Try to fight the longest possible and have fun!

///////// CONTROLS /////////
Q & D : MOVE
Left/Right Arrows: MOVE
Z & S: POINT GUN
Up/Down Arrows: POINT GUN
Shift/Mouse Left: SHOOT
Space: JUMP
A: AUTO-FIRE
P: PAUSE

You can change the game's volume through the Pause Menu.

(The game is currently built for AZERTY keyboards, but will soon support QWERTY as well. For now, you can use arrow keys or the mouse or the auto-fire button to play.)

///////// STATE OF THE GAME /////////

[IN EARLY DEVELOPMENT]
It's pretty much an alpha of our game. The earliest playable product we can upload on itch.io. For now the game is two weeks old. We're pretty happy with the current state of the game and we're already thinking of plenty of ways to add interesting content into the game. New zones, new enemies, new upgrades, new Mechanics, new a lot of things! Right now there is only one playable room available but we think it's already a lot of potential for hours of fun and rage. We're already working on adding more rooms in a near future.

///////// PLANS FROM NOW ON /////////
This is a list of changes the game will surely get in the future.
The first changes on this list are some of the most important in our eyes and will be done really soon.

From the closest change to the latest:
- Add some new interesting Levels;
- Add proper QWERTY support;
- Finish Sound Designing the game;
- Add Music;
- Better Fullscreen/Windowed support;
- A proper lobby (A playable non-combat room, used as some immersive menu);
- New content through new interesting mechanics;

///////// FOLLOW US /////////
If you want to know what's up with our game, follow us here or:
https://www.facebook.com/BlueBirb/

///////// NOTES /////////
The game expects a resolution at least this large: 1920x1080 px
We don't currently support other resolutions. If you don't have the right screen resolution, you can always try to change it on your own.
